document.full_text: ryan kesler broke a tie with a power-play goal at 7:28 of the third period, and vancouver beat nashville to take a 3-1 series lead.
document.title: canucks 4, predators 2 : canucks push predators to brink
lines_and_colors: ryan kesler broke a tie with a power-play goal at 7:28 of the third period, and vancouver beat nashville to take a 3-1 series lead.
